tool_description:
An league of Legnds API to get all champions, chamption details, champion rotations, league queue, game from summoner, some informtions in a summoner. 
All information is translated into 28 languages! 
Available for all regions!
name: League of Legends API
title: League of Legends API

api_list.name: GET queue
api_list.description: Returns the list of people in division, tier and according to the type of queue

api_list.name: GET player by name
api_list.description: Return you the summoner related the name given

api_list.name: GET player by puiid
api_list.description: Return you the summoner profile related to the puuid given

api_list.name: GET PlayerMatch
api_list.description: Return an detailed list of games for the number you passed for a player

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Number of match return
By default 10

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description:
Starting number in the player's game list

By default 0 ( last game played)

api_list.name: GET Champion details
api_list.description: Getting detail from champion name you give, translate by the language you give

api_list.name: GET champions
api_list.description: Get list of all champions by default give you in english

api_list.name: GET Champion rotation
api_list.description: Return's you a liste of free champion ids and liste of free champions ids for new player.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://league-of-legends-api1.p.rapidapi.com/champion-rotation"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "league-of-legends-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://league-of-legends-api1.p.rapidapi.com/champion-rotation"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "league-of-legends-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
